2. Observe dashboard page
step.expectedresults:

2. Look and feel of page UI should be appropriate.

testcase.name: To test change language functionality

testcase.preconditions: Dashboard Open in browser

1. Open application.
2. View dashboard page
3. Select option to hange language
step.expectedresults:
1. By default English language should be seen selected.
2. User should be able to switch language within chinease, japanese,Korean.
3. Complete application should get transformed into selected language.

testcase.name: Login page

testcase.preconditions: Existing user should be present.

step.actions:
1. Open Dashboard
2. Enter valid Email and password
3. Click on Login button
step.expectedresults: By default Publisher section dashboard should get displayed.

testcase.name: Login page with valid data

2. Enter valid Email and valid password
3. Click on Login button
step.expectedresults: User should be able to login sucessfully

testcase.name: Login page with invalid data

step.actions:

step.actions:

2. Do not enter any Email and password
3. Click on Login button
step.expectedresults: Apllication should display message such as "Authentication failed, please check your username and password."

step.expectedresults: Entered Email and password should get removed.

testcase.name: To verify logout functionality

4. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1. User should get logged out of application.

testcase.name: New user
testcase.summary: To check add New user functionality
testcase.preconditions: User should be on Dashboard login page.

step.actions:
1.Click on new user link.

2.Enter first name.

3.Enter last name.

4.Enter email address.

5.Enter company.

6.Enter password.

7.Re-enter the password. 

8.Select country from drop down list.

9.Select account type from drop down list.

10.Check/Uncheck "Email me about vungle news" checkbox.

11.Click on submit button.
step.expectedresults:
1. If invalid details are entered, new user should not get created.
2. User should be able to add new user by using "New user" link on login page.
3.User should receive confirmation mail on his registered mail account.

testsuite.name: Publisher Application
testsuite.details:
Publisher Application

  1. Create Pub APP ID
  2. Create Placement ID
  3. Edit & Details page of Pub APP ID & Placement ID

testcase.name: Publishing Application
testcase.summary: To check functionality when user clicks on Publisher Application
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions: 1. Click on "Add New Application"
step.expectedresults: Application should get redirected on Create new Publisher Application page

testcase.name: Submit blank Publishing Application
testcase.summary: To check functionality when user submits blank form
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Application"

step.actions:
1. Do not enter any details.
2. Click on submit option.
step.expectedresults: Blank form should not get submitted. Application should display alert message.

testcase.name: Cancel button functionality on Publishing Application
testcase.summary: To check Cancel button functionality on Publisher Application
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Application"

step.actions: 1. Click on "Cancel" button of new Publisher Application page
step.expectedresults:
Page should get closed and it should get redirected on publisher account details page
(dashboard/accounts/pub)

testcase.name: Create a pub application
testcase.summary: To create new Publisher Application
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Application"

step.actions:
Enter necessary valid details such as:
1. Select Platform such as iOS/Android
2. Enter Application Name
3. Select checkbox for My app is live on the app store
4. Add following App store URL
iOS Store URL: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ibotta-better-than-coupons/id559887125?mt=8&uo=4
Android Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ibotta.android&hl=en
5. Select Category from Drop down list
6. Click on "Submit" button
step.expectedresults: New Publisher Application should get created with default status as Test Mode along with unique PUB APP ID

testcase.name: Verify legacy ads on Test Mode
testcase.summary: To verify Legacy ads  on Test Mode
testcase.preconditions: 1. Create Pub ID and verify that status is present in testmode

step.actions:
1. Add created Pub ID on Application
2. Play application
step.expectedresults: When PUB APP in test mode . Application should receive Legacy ads.

testcase.name: Active Publishing Application
testcase.summary: To check active Publishing Application
testcase.preconditions: Publisher Application should be created and associated with advertiser id

step.actions: 1. Change Publisher Application status fromTest Mode to Active
step.expectedresults:
Publisher Application status should be changed as Active.
(App should receiving associated CloudUX Ads)

testcase.name: Verify Mraid ads
testcase.summary: To verify for Mraid ads
testcase.preconditions:
1. Create Pub ID and status as Active
2. Create and Associate Advertiser to Pub ID and Pub ID to Advertiser
3. Add new Campaign for Advertiser and create new Creative for Campaign and status should be active for Campaign & creative

step.actions:
1. Add created Pub ID on Application
2. Initialise application and play ad
step.expectedresults: Application should recevied Mraid ads.

testcase.name: Inactive Publishing Application Status
testcase.summary: To check the Publishing Application status in Inactive mode
testcase.preconditions: Publisher Application should be created

step.actions: 1. Change Publisher Application status to Inactive
step.expectedresults:
Publisher Application status should be changed as Inactive.
(App should no longer receive Vungle ads.)
It should show config 400/500 error in charles

testcase.name: Edit Publisher Application
testcase.summary: To edit Publisher Application
testcase.preconditions: Publisher Application should be already created

step.actions: 1. On Publisher Application page click on Edit option of Application details/Publisher settings icon.
step.expectedresults: Edit publisher Application page should be displayed and user should be able to update details.

testcase.name: Add Placement ID
testcase.summary: To check the placement ID
testcase.preconditions: Publisher Application should be created

step.actions:
1. Click on "Add New Placement"
2. Enter details and submit form.
step.expectedresults:
1. Application should redirect user to create Placement page.
2. If user enter valid details then form should get submitted sucessfully else respective alert should get displayed.

testcase.name: Rewarded option for placement ID
testcase.summary: Check Rewarded option for placement ID
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1. Click on existing/new createed placement ID
2. Check/uncheck rewarded option.
3. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to check/uncheck the rewarded checkbox.
2.If checked: Rewarded ad should play for respective placement ID.
3.If unchecked: non-rewarded ad should play for respective placement ID

2.Enter value in CPM floor text and submit.
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to enter any integer value in CPM floor
2.Only integer value be accepted by application.

testcase.name: Create new Placement ID
testcase.summary: To create new Placement ID

On Create Placement page fill all necessary details

step.actions: Do not enter any details and submit form
step.expectedresults:
Form should not get submitted.

testcase.name: Activity section of publisher application
testcase.summary: To check when user makes changes in his publisher application then those changes reflected in activity section of publisher application.
testcase.preconditions:
1.User should be logged in.

2.Publisher app should be created.

step.actions:
1.Search existing publisher app in Global search.

2.Click on setting icon of searched app.

3.Make changes in pulisher application.

4. Observe activity section.
step.expectedresults: When user makes changes in publisher application then those changes should get reflected in activity section of publisher application.

testcase.name: To verify Win notice source field
testcase.summary: verify Win notice source field
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go to Advertiser section.
2. Select option to add new campaign.
3. Check Win notice source field
step.expectedresults:
1.User should able select SDK/Exchange option from this field.
2.This field defines what method will be used to hit the provided notification URL. If SDK is chosen, the request will be originated from the device itself in the moment of VIEW. If exchange is chosen, the request will be originated from our exchange server in the moment of AUCTION WIN as specified on the openRTB protocol. In general only 3rd party DSPs will want to use the latter.

1. Go to advertiser section.
2. Click on Account stage setting icon.
4. Select option to add date range
5. Select start date and end date
6. Save activity
step.expectedresults:
1. User should be able to select valid date range.
2. Start date should be always smaller than end date.
3. Added activity should get listed.

testcase.name: To check reset functionality
testcase.summary: Reset date range
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go to advertiser section.
2. Click on Account stage setting icon.
4. Select option to add date range
5. Select start date and end date
6. Save activity
7. Select option to reset date range
step.expectedresults: 1. Added date range should get reset.

testcase.name: To test functionality when user clicks on account name
testcase.summary: Account stage -> user title
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go to advertiser section.
2. Click on Account stage setting icon.
3. Click on user title eg. Dashboard Automation 6 - Admin or icon in front of it.
step.expectedresults:
1. Pop should get displayed.
2. Pop up should contain 2 options :Account list and Application list.
3. When clicked on account list, all added accounts should get displayed in sorted manner.
4. When clicked on application list, all available applications should get displayed in sorted manner.

User should be logged-in.
Navigate to payment info option.

step.actions:
1.Select any tax form from list
2.Fill the form and click on next button
3.Again come back on tax form.
4.Click on submit a new tax form
step.expectedresults: Confirm Change of Tax Form popup should open with cancel and confirm button when user click on it.

testcase.name: Confirm Change of Tax Form
testcase.summary: Check Confirm Change of Tax Form
testcase.preconditions:
User should be logged-in.
Navigate to payment info option.

step.actions:
1.Select any tax form from list
2.Fill the form and click on next button
3.Again come back on tax form.
4.Click on submit a new tax form
5.Click confirm button on pop up
step.expectedresults: User should go back on tax selection form

testcase.name: Back button functionality

testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions: 1.Click on back button.
step.expectedresults: User should get redirected on tax forms page after clicking on back button.

testcase.name: Update password option functionality
testcase.summary: To check user is able to update his password.
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions:
1.Click on update password option of hamburger.
2.On pop up enter your new password.
3.Enter your new password again.
4.Click on submit button.
step.expectedresults: User's password should get updated successfully.

step.expectedresults: User should be able to cancel updating password by clicking on cancel button.

testcase.name: New RTB Connections button functionality
testcase.summary: To check functionality of New RTB Connections button.
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions: 1.Click on "New RTB Connections" button.
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to create New RTB Connections page.

testcase.name: Create new RTB Connection
testcase.summary: To check newly RTB Connections is visible in table.
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions:
1.Click on "New RTB Connections" button.
2. Select Publisher Account from dropdown list
3. Enter name for RTB connection
4. Enter Endpoint
5. Select option as ADM Type as Vast / Vungle
6. Select Win Notification Source SDK/ Exchange
7. Select option Overwrite Country List? Yes/ NO
8. Add Countries from country dropdownlist
9. Select Status as Active /Inactive
10. Click on Submit button
step.expectedresults: Newly created RTB connection should be visible in the table.

testcase.name: Update RTB Connection
testcase.summary: To check user is able to update the already created RTB Connection.
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions: 1.Click on update icon present in "Created" field of RTB Connection table.
step.expectedresults: User should be able to update the already created RTB Connection

step.actions: 1.Click on various fields of table such as Account / name/Endpoint /status./created for sorting.
step.expectedresults: User should be able to sort RTB Connection according to his selection.
